Uses of Interface
org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.backup.Backuper

Packages that use Backuper
org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.backup Set of classes to wrap calls and execution of Octopus to execute backup and recovery of databases 
 

Uses of Backuper in org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.backup
 

Classes in org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.backup that implement Backuper
 class AbstractPostgreSQLBackuper
          This abstract class provides base methods for PostgreSQL backupers.
 class DerbyEmbeddedBackuper
          This class defines a Backuper for Apache Derby databases.
 class OctopusBackuper
          This class defines a Backuper based on Octopus v2.8.
 class PostgreSQLBinaryBackuper
          This class defines a Backuper for PostgreSQL databases.
 class PostgreSQLPlainTextBackuper
          This class defines a Backuper for PostgreSQL databases.
 

Methods in org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.backup that return Backuper
 Backuper BackupManager.getBackuperByName(java.lang.String name)
          Retrieve a backuper given its name.
 Backuper BackupManager.getBackuperByFormat(java.lang.String format)
          Get the first backuper that supports the given dump format.
 

Methods in org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.backup with parameters of type Backuper
 void BackupManager.registerBackuper(java.lang.String name, Backuper backuper)
          Register a new backuper under a logical name.
